trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a method across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define um contrato que componentes podem usar para acessar informações sobre um método entre limites de domínio e o processo do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: An IRemoteMethodInfoContract represents a method of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um IRemoteMethodInfoContract representa um método de um objeto remoto que implementa o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>interface.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more methods of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar um ou mais métodos de um objeto remoto, use o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>que representa o tipo do objeto remoto.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the method that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o método que este <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData> structure includes the types of the method's return value and parameters.
trans-unit.target: As informações fornecidas pelo <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData>estrutura inclui os tipos de parâmetros e o valor de retorno do método.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData"></xref> that provides information about the method that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData"> </xref> que fornece informações sobre o método que este <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the method that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o método que este <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: If the invoked method does not have a return value (for example, the method is a constructor), Invoke returns a default <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> in which the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o método invocado não tem um valor de retorno (por exemplo, o método é um construtor), Invoke retorna um padrão <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>no qual a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind?displayProperty=fullName>e a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> </xref> que identifica o objeto que contém o método a ser invocado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to invoke the method.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> </xref> valores que especifica como invocar o método.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the method parameters; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the method does not have any parameters.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> </xref> que especifica os parâmetros de método; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o método não tem nenhum parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the method will use for any locale-specific type conversions of the arguments or return value.
trans-unit.target: A ID de localidade que o método usará para qualquer específicas da localidade conversões dos argumentos de tipo ou valor de retorno.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> que especifica o valor de retorno do método invocado.
